name: It Can Only End In Death- DEMO
name_original: It Can Only End In Death- DEMO
description:
It Can Only End In Death is an incredibly difficult text adventure CYOA horror game where, no matter what, as the title states, It Can Only End In Death. Journey through Castle Mortem, where every choice is a roll of the dice. Try your best to make it as far as you can, but remember; the title is the rule, and death is inescapable. You can only prolong the inevitable for so long, adventurer.

This game is still in development, and this is only the first scene in the game. If you enjoy, please let me know! Feedback is always accepted, and helps make It Can Only End In Death a better game!
